Public NotInheritable Class CompilerErrorException Inherits ApplicationException
public ref class CompilerErrorException sealed : ApplicationException

Docs.summary: The CompilerErrorException class defines the exception that is thrown when an application manifest compiler encounters an error.The CompilerErrorException class is derived from the System.ApplicationException class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ArrayList errorMessages) cil managed

Docs.param: An ArrayList object that contains the error string that is returned by the application manifest compiler. Each element in the ArrayList contains an individual, ordered error string, from the first encountered to the last encountered.
Docs.summary: The CompilerErrorException constructor initializes a new object of the class, with the error messages specified as an ordered ArrayList.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorMessages As ArrayList
public: property System::Collections::ArrayList ^ ErrorMessages { System::Collections::ArrayList ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: The ErrorMessages property contains the errors that are encountered during compilation of the application manifest.
